cthoelken
Class SumOfPairs

java.lang.Object
  gui.BioinfAlgorithm
      cthoelken.SumOfPairs

public class SumOfPairs
extends gui.BioinfAlgorithm

Implementation of the Sum-Of-Pairs Algorithm for optimal multiple alignments with linear gap costs.

Author:
Clemens Thoelken

backtrack

private void backtrack(int x,
                       int y,
                       int z,
                       Alignment algn)
Backtracks the CostMatrix for feasable paths and adds them to the internal alignment list

Parameters:
x - x-offset
y - y-offset
z - z-offset
algn - Initial alignment, starts with an empty alignment

score

public static double score(Alignment algn,
                           boolean usePAM,
                           double gapCosts)
Scores a pre-aligned alignment based on SOP-Score

Parameters:
algn - Pre-aligned alignment of same lenght sequences
usePAM - Use PAM for substitution
gapCosts - Gap costs for the alignment
Returns:
Returns the total score
